test.title: Create an order in the glovo application

custom.preconds: Download the application to your mobile device. Register in the app. Log in to the app. Open the app
custom.steps: 1.Choose the category "Їжа" 2.Choose the restorant 3.Add the selected dish to the basket 4.Open the basket 5.Provide information about allergies 6.To note the need for silverware 7.Specify the delivery address 8.Сhoose another recipient 9.Choose the time of delivery 10.Choose a payment method 11.Add a promo code 12.Check your personal details 13.Сonfirm the order
custom.expected: Order created. The system redirects to the page with details and tracking of the order

custom.preconds: Download the application to your mobile device. Register in the app. Log in to the app. Open the app Choose the delivery address "Мілютенка 25"

step.content: Click on the icon "Їжа"
step.expected: The system opened icon "Food"

step.content: Click on the icon "Ресторани"
step.expected: The system opened page with all available restaurant

step.content: Click on picture of "Just Doner" restaurant
step.expected: The system opened this restaurant and their menu

step.content: Click on radio button "Доставка" at the high part of page
Click on category "Хіт продажів"
step.expected: The system opened the page with popular dishes

step.content: Click on the dish picture "Донер з куркою MEGA XXL 500г"
step.expected: The System opened description of dish

step.content: Click on category "Додатки"
step.expected: Opened a subsection with double category

step.content: Click on the plus to add additional cheese
step.expected: the amount is displayed taking into account the additional ingredient

step.content: Click on green button "Додати" at the bottom of the page
step.expected: The System write a confirmation message "Ура замовлення додано"

step.content: Click on green button at the bottom of the page
step.expected: The system opened the basket

step.content: Click on the icon "Їжа"
step.expected: The system opened icon "Food"

step.content: Click on the icon "Ресторани"
step.expected: The system opened page with all available restaurant

step.content: Click on picture of "Just Doner" restaurant
step.expected: The system opened this restaurant and their menu

step.content: Click on radio button "Доставка" at the high part of page
Click on category "Хіт продажів"
step.expected: The system opened the page with popular dishes

step.content: Click on the dish picture "Донер з куркою MEGA XXL 500г"
step.expected: The System opened description of dish

step.content: Click on category "Додатки"
step.expected: Opened a subsection with double category

step.content: Click on the plus to add additional cheese
step.expected: the amount is displayed taking into account the additional ingredient

step.content: Click on green button "Додати" at the bottom of the page
step.expected: The System write a confirmation message "Ура замовлення додано"

step.content: Click on green button at the bottom of the page
step.expected: The system opened the basket

test.title: Create an order in the glovo application

custom.preconds: Download the application to your mobile device. Register in the app. Log in to the app. Open the app Choose the delivery address "Мілютенка 25" Add product to the basket

step.content: Сheck order details
Click on green plus near the name of dish
step.expected: the system adds an additional product The amount of the product is increased by 2 times

step.content: Click on category "Вказати інформацію про алергію"
step.expected: the page for entering text opens

step.content: Write a message about mushroom allergy Click on button "Зберегти"
step.expected: System saved our message in our order page

step.content: Click on radio button "Потрібні столові прибори"
Check the automatically generated address
step.expected: The system generated the address automatically, it is depend of you choice of address in the start of procedure

step.content: Click on category "Надсилаєте інший особі"
step.expected: The system open the page where you can write a personal information of another person

step.content: Press the input and write the name of the person who will pick up the delivery. (Nikita)
Click on Flag at the left part of page and choice a country code (Ukraine +380) and write a correct Ukrainian phone number
Click on green button "Зберегти"
step.expected: The system redirect to order page and save our information

step.content: Click on category "Спосіб оплати" and choose "Оплата готівкою "
step.expected: The system saved our information

step.content: Click on category "Є промкод?"
step.expected: the system open the input where we can write a prom code

step.content: Write a prom code FTK2738647 and click on button "Застосувати" in the lower right corner of the page
step.expected: the system will save our promo code and recalculate the total amount of the order

step.content: Click on green button "Підтвердити замовлення" in the lower part of page
step.expected: Order created. The system redirects to the page with details and tracking of the order

step.content: Сheck order details
Click on green plus near the name of dish
step.expected: the system adds an additional product The amount of the product is increased by 2 times

step.content: Click on category "Вказати інформацію про алергію"
step.expected: the page for entering text opens

step.content: Write a message about mushroom allergy Click on button "Зберегти"
step.expected: System saved our message in our order page

step.content: Click on radio button "Потрібні столові прибори"
Check the automatically generated address
step.expected: The system generated the address automatically, it is depend of you choice of address in the start of procedure

step.content: Click on category "Надсилаєте інший особі"
step.expected: The system open the page where you can write a personal information of another person

step.content: Press the input and write the name of the person who will pick up the delivery. (Nikita)
step.actual: The system allows you to write in letters and numbers, Cyrillic and Latin

step.content: Click on Flag at the left part of page and choice a country code (Ukraine +380) and write a correct Ukrainian phone number
Click on green button "Зберегти"
step.expected: The system redirect to order page and save our information

step.content: Click on category "Спосіб оплати" and choose "Оплата готівкою "
step.expected: The system saved our information

step.content: Click on category "Є промкод?"
step.expected: the system open the input where we can write a prom code

step.content: Write a prom code FTK2738647 and click on button "Застосувати" in the lower right corner of the page
step.expected: the system will save our promo code and recalculate the total amount of the order

step.content: Click on green button "Підтвердити замовлення" in the lower part of page
step.expected: Order created. The system redirects to the page with details and tracking of the order

test.title: Create an order in the glovo application with changing the delivery address at the final stage of the order

custom.preconds: Download the application to your mobile device. Register in the app. Log in to the app. Open the app Choose the delivery address "Мілютенка 25" Add product to the basket

step.content: Сheck order details
Click on category "Вказати інформацію про алергію"
step.expected: the page for entering text opens

step.content: Write a message about nuts allergy Click on button "Зберегти"
step.expected: System saved our message in our order page

step.content: Click on radio button "Потрібні столові прибори"
Check the automatically generated address
step.expected: The system generated the address automatically, it is depend of you choice of address in the start of procedure. The choice of restaurants that can bring the order depends on the choice of address.

step.content: Click on green flag in the right part of page in category "Інформація про доставку"
step.expected: the system open page with map and input where you can write a name of street

step.content: Click on search input and write name of street "Боричів тік 30"
Click on green button in the lower part of page "Підтвердити адресу"
step.expected: The system redirects to the order page. The system displays an error message "ОЙ! перепрошуємо, цей заклад більше не доступний" The system does not allow to finish processing with a new address

step.content: Сheck order details
Click on category "Вказати інформацію про алергію"
step.expected: the page for entering text opens

step.content: Write a message about nuts allergy Click on button "Зберегти"
step.expected: System saved our message in our order page

step.content: Click on radio button "Потрібні столові прибори"
Check the automatically generated address
step.expected: The system generated the address automatically, it is depend of you choice of address in the start of procedure. The choice of restaurants that can bring the order depends on the choice of address.

step.content: Click on green flag in the right part of page in category "Інформація про доставку"
step.expected: the system open page with map and input where you can write a name of street

step.content: Click on search input and write name of street "Боричів тік 30"
Click on green button in the lower part of page "Підтвердити адресу"
step.expected: The system redirects to the order page. The system displays an error message "ОЙ! перепрошуємо, цей заклад більше не доступний" The system does not allow to finish processing with a new address
step.actual: Despite the changed address, the system allowed to continue placing the order. Later, the operator of the restaurant called and informed about the impossibility of delivery to the changed address.
